==Skills==
These skills are skills that are present in the game files, but are not used or have properties that are never used (e.g. the skill in the special skill refine of {{Wt|Camilla's Axe|refine=Skill1}} has usage restrictions so that only {{Mt|cavalry}} and {{Mt|flying}} units can use it, but this is never seen since no other unit can use Camilla's Axe).
===SID_無し===
Skill with no name or any properties. It cannot be forged, and does nothing when used.
{{Weapon Infobox
|no cargo=true
|noImg=1

|might=0

|statModifiers=0,0,0,0,0
|required=-
|properties=
}}{{clear}}

===Exclusive skills===
{{See Also|:Category:Skills with unused restrictions}}
For most [[exclusive skills]] such as {{St|Sacae's Blessing}}, the list of allowed movement or weapon types usually contains every single type instead of just being empty (as SID_無し is) or minimally having only the Hero's weapon type and movement type. However, some do not have a full list and exclude certain types of units despite never being inheritable. These are also likely an indication that these skills will only ever be released on units that match its restrictions.
====Weapons====
Only weapons that do not allow all movement types are listed.
{{#cargo_query:table=Skills|fields=CONCAT('<ul class="hlist">',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT '<li>[[',_pageName,'|',Name,']]</li>' ORDER BY Name SEPARATOR ''),'</ul>')=Skills,CONCAT('{{(}}or{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetCannotUse{{!}}icons{{!}}canUseMove=',CanUseMove__full,'{{!}}canUseWeapon=',CanUseWeapon__full,'{{)}}{{!}}None{{)}}')=Cannot use|where=Scategory='weapon' AND Exclusive=1 AND RefinePath IS NULL AND CanUseMove__full!='{{MoveList|All}}'|group by=CanUseMove__full,CanUseWeapon__full}}
====Assists====
{{#cargo_query:table=Skills|fields=CONCAT('<ul class="hlist">',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT '<li>[[',_pageName,'|',Name,']]</li>' ORDER BY Name SEPARATOR ''),'</ul>')=Skills,CONCAT('{{(}}or{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetCannotUse{{!}}icons{{!}}canUseMove=',CanUseMove__full,'{{!}}canUseWeapon=',CanUseWeapon__full,'{{)}}{{!}}None{{)}}')=Cannot use|where=Scategory='assist' AND Exclusive=1 AND RefinePath IS NULL AND !(CanUseMove__full='{{MoveList|All}}' AND CanUseWeapon__full='{{WeaponList|All}}')|group by=CanUseMove__full,CanUseWeapon__full}}
====Specials====
{{#cargo_query:table=Skills|fields=CONCAT('<ul class="hlist">',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT '<li>[[',_pageName,'|',Name,']]</li>' ORDER BY Name SEPARATOR ''),'</ul>')=Skills,CONCAT('{{(}}or{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetCannotUse{{!}}icons{{!}}canUseMove=',CanUseMove__full,'{{!}}canUseWeapon=',CanUseWeapon__full,'{{)}}{{!}}None{{)}}')=Cannot use|where=Scategory='special' AND Exclusive=1 AND RefinePath IS NULL AND !(CanUseMove__full='{{MoveList|All}}' AND CanUseWeapon__full='{{WeaponList|All}}')|group by=CanUseMove__full,CanUseWeapon__full}}
====Passives====
{{#cargo_query:table=Skills|fields=CONCAT('<ul class="hlist">',GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT '<li>[[',_pageName,'|',Name,']]</li>' ORDER BY Name SEPARATOR ''),'</ul>')=Skills,CONCAT('{{(}}or{{!}}{{(}}#invoke:GetCannotUse{{!}}icons{{!}}canUseMove=',CanUseMove__full,'{{!}}canUseWeapon=',CanUseWeapon__full,'{{)}}{{!}}None{{)}}')=Cannot use|where=Scategory LIKE 'passive%' AND Exclusive=1 AND RefinePath IS NULL AND !(CanUseMove__full='{{MoveList|All}}' AND CanUseWeapon__full='{{WeaponList|All}}')|group by=CanUseMove__full,CanUseWeapon__full}}

==Skill effects==
==Hero skills unlock rarity==
Some Heroes have unlock rarities for skills where the unlock rarity is lower than the lowest possible rarity the Hero can be obtained at. These can be viewed on each individual Hero page.

These unused unlock rarities appear to be intentional for these reasons:
*They are displayed in [[Fire Emblem Heroes: Summoner's Guide]].
*When the summoning rarities of Heroes in a pool are lowered, their unlock rarities are not modified.
